summary: Build a simple funding/landing website for an on-demand electrician booking application project, including budget breakdown, benefits, a near-top donation section with Scan & Pay QR image plus bank donation details, company branding (logo), contact info, director names listed near the footer quick links, custom domain setup, and a full futuristic/professional visual redesign: white background with a single-shade blue for all non-white elements, plus subtle ambient motion/3D-style effects (gradients, glassmorphism, floating shapes) while remaining a single long landing page.
architectural_notes: Design direction: full redesign (sections/layout can change) but remains a single long landing page; white background + single-shade blue accents; subtle ambient animations with glassmorphism/gradients/floating shapes.
known_issues: Live deployment link https://v3-your-project.caffeine.build/ returns DNS_PROBE_FINISHED_NXDOMAIN (site not reachable); user requested redeploy to fix.
Contact phone number displayed on the site is incorrect; needs to be replaced everywhere with +918638493216 (header/footer/any other occurrences).
Publishing/redeploy and contact-number update attempts are failing due to repeated AI service/internal LLM errors (changes not applied).

existing_features.title: Create a single-page, responsive funding/landing website that explains the on-demand electrician booking application project (Rapido-like design direction, but for electricians) and is suitable for mobile and desktop browsers.

Add a prominent donation section near the top of the page that displays the uploaded Scan & Pay image with a heading and a short description that explains how donations will benefit the community and the nation.
Include a budget breakdown section that clearly states the funding requirement is 5L and summarizes what the funding covers for completing the mobile app build.

Include a benefits/impact section that highlights: benefits to the electrician community (more leads/business), ITI graduates (skills kickstart and placement opportunities), and broader economic boost.

Apply a cohesive, creative visual theme across the landing page (colors, typography, spacing, section styling) that fits an “electrician services + community funding” concept and avoids a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Update the global Tailwind/Shadcn theme tokens to use a monochrome (white/black/gray) palette, replacing the current amber/orange electrician palette for both light mode and dark mode.

Refactor landing page component styling to remove amber/orange-specific Tailwind classes and gradients, replacing them with a consistent black/white/gray visual treatment while keeping the existing layout, sections, and content unchanged.
Add the uploaded ElectroBeez logo image as the company logo in the top navigation/header and also display the same logo in other sections of the landing page (hero and footer).

Replace the current monochrome theme across the entire site with a professional blue-and-white color palette, updating both light mode and dark mode theme tokens and refactoring component classes as needed to match the new palette consistently.

Add the company contact details (email: electrobeezindia@gmail.com, phone: +918638493216) to appropriate sections of the landing page (at minimum: footer; optionally: header), with clickable mailto and tel links.

Provide a project documentation page that guides the user through making the deployed site accessible via their custom domain on the Internet Computer (DNS records + boundary node/custom domain configuration), including placeholders for the user’s domain name and deployed canister ID.

Trigger a fresh redeploy of the current frontend and backend canisters so the live site becomes reachable again, addressing the reported DNS_PROBE_FINISHED_NXDOMAIN when opening https://v3-your-project.caffeine.build/.
Add the provided bank donation details inside the existing Donation section (#donate) on the landing page, displayed as a clearly labeled block alongside the existing Scan & Pay content.
Add a 'Directors' (organization leadership) list containing the three provided names together in the last/footer area near the existing 'Quick Links' section.

Replace any incorrect contact phone number displayed anywhere on the site with the correct phone number "+918638493216", including updating any visible formatted text (e.g., "+91 86384 93216") and any corresponding clickable tel: links so they dial +918638493216.

Publish the current version to production by triggering a fresh redeploy of the frontend and backend canisters, and verify the live site becomes reachable again at https://v3-your-project.caffeine.build/.
Update ONLY the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[6]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[2]/div[2]/p[2] so that its visible text is exactly "+918638493216".
Publish now by triggering a fresh production redeploy of the current frontend and backend canisters, and verify the site becomes reachable at https://v3-your-project.caffeine.build/.

Redesign the landing page as a full layout + section redesign (still a single long scrolling page), while keeping the existing content meaning and the existing section anchors usable for navigation: #home, #about, #budget, #benefits, #donate.
Enforce a white background across the website (light mode) and ensure the overall visual styling remains futuristic and professional with a clean, high-end look.

Constrain the color system so that all non-white accents use a single consistent shade of blue (used for primary actions, links, highlights, icons, borders/rings), and avoid introducing additional accent hues.

Add subtle ambient motion/3D-style effects to the landing page design, using lightweight visual techniques (e.g., glassmorphism panels, soft gradients, floating shapes, gentle animated highlights) without making the page feel distracting.

Update the sticky top navigation visual treatment to match the futuristic redesign (white background context + glassmorphism on scroll), while preserving existing navigation behavior and contact CTA usability.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a simple funding/landing website explaining the on-demand electrician application project, including budget breakdown (5L) and benefits to the electrician community/ITI graduates/economy.
Add a near-top donation section featuring a Scan & Pay QR image with heading and description about how donations benefit the community and the nation.
Configure the website to be accessible via the user's custom domain (domain/DNS setup and deployment configuration).
Add the provided company logo image across the site (top navigation/header, hero, and footer sections).
Replace the current theme with a professional blue-and-white color palette across the entire site.
Add company contact details: electrobeezindia@gmail.com (email) and +918638493216 (phone number) in appropriate sections (e.g., header/footer/contact area).
Add bank donation details (Punjab National Bank; A/C 0747010213936; IFSC PUNB0074720) within the donation section.
Add a director/organization leadership list (Kamal Sing Bhumij, Jugensing Tokbi, David Gogoi) together in the last/footer section near the Quick Links area.

Full futuristic/professional redesign: white background, single-shade blue for all non-white elements, subtle ambient motion/3D-style effects (gradients, glassmorphism, floating shapes), keep single long landing-page format.

projectName: Funding landing website for on-demand electrician app (budget + benefits + QR donation section)
